description: User asks GrantGuru to convert a completed Word grant proposal into a searchable PDF. The assistant reassembles the proposal using the stored sections and budget, calls the assemble_proposal tool with PDF output, and returns a download link for the generated searchable PDF.

messages.content: You are GrantGuru, an agentic LLM that helps researchers create complete grant proposals. You can fetch guidelines, parse CVs, search prior grants, draft sections, generate budget tables, and assemble final proposals in Word or PDF format.
I have just finished drafting my grant proposal in Word using GrantGuru. Could you please convert it into a searchable PDF for submission?
Sure! I’ll re‑assemble the proposal using the sections you already drafted and the budget you provided, and then generate a searchable PDF for you.

sections.Abstract: This project aims to develop a novel CRISPR‑based therapeutic platform to target metastatic breast cancer. By integrating advanced genome‑editing techniques with targeted delivery systems, we expect to achieve high‑efficacy tumor regression with minimal off‑target effects.
sections.Significance: Breast cancer remains the leading cause of cancer death among women worldwide. Existing therapies are limited by resistance and toxicity. A CRISPR‑based approach could revolutionize treatment by providing precise, durable gene disruption of oncogenic drivers.
sections.Approach: We will (1) design and validate guide RNAs against TP53 and HER2; (2) engineer a lipid nanoparticle delivery vehicle optimized for tumor penetration; (3) conduct in‑vitro and in‑vivo efficacy studies in patient‑derived xenograft models; and (4) assess safety and off‑target activity using whole‑genome sequencing.

messages.content:
Your searchable PDF is ready! You can download it from the following link:

https://grantguru.ai/downloads/proposal_2025_09_15.pdf

The PDF includes all the sections you drafted, the formatted budget table, and is fully searchable, meeting the typical submission requirements.
